text: viśvāsavantayini! yudevvanvada, kristiyānuvanvada, (obaṭa) ārakṣakayin (avliyā) bavaṭa pat kara noganu. (obaṭa saturukam kirīmehi) ovungen keneku anit kenāṭa udavkaruvan vaśayen siṭinnāha. obagen kavurun hō ovunva (tamanṭa) ārakṣakayin bavaṭa pat kara gatahot niyata vaśayenma ohuda ovungen vūveku vannēya. niyata vaśayenma allāh (mema) aparādhakāra janatāva (ovungē napuru kriyāvanhi hētuven) ṛju mārgayehi ætuḷu nokarannēya
